result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: Domestic Abuse - Infliction of Physical Pain or Injury

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shawn Demetrius Lawrence

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Shawn Demetrius Lawrence appeared by video.  Attorney Michael L. Chernin appeared by video for Shawn Demetrius Lawrence.  Prosecuting attorney Michael J. Odden in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defense is requesting final pretrial and jury trial dates. Case is adjourned to 2-1-22 at 8:30 am for final pretrial and 2-15-22 at 8:30 am for jury trial.
Final pre-trial scheduled for February 1, 2023 at 08:30 am.
Jury trial scheduled for February 15, 2023 at 08:30 am.
Motion for New Pretrial Or Alternatively Schedule a Trial Date Via Email, filed.

No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms. 
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT TO REPORT TO THE MILWAUKEE COUNTY JAIL (CJF) TO BE BOOKED AND RELEASED BY 5:00 P.M. ON Wednesday, October 12, 2022. IF THEY FAIL TO APPEAR, A BENCH WARRANT WILL BE ISSUED FOR THEIR ARREST.

Defendant Shawn Demetrius Lawrence in court.  Attorney Michael L. Chernin in court for Shawn Demetrius Lawrence.  Attorney Samuel Tyler Tabin in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case retabbed to DV intake judge of the week. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to Defendant's attorney. Defendant plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 10.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with WMD and her children
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Defendant Shawn Demetrius Lawrence not in court. 
Court allowing time for the Defendant to appear in person. Case adjourned back to Out of Custody Court, Safety Building Room 221.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 10/7/22 @ 2:30p
